alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 2:46AM MDT until August 18 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following area, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell especially southern portions. * WHEN...From Noon MDT today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flash flooding of slot canyons, normally dry wash, slick rock areas, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell
